languages.text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Сслит резко бьет хвостом и наносит <u>(от 33 до 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g} всем существам на соседних с ним клетках. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing 33-42 {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets hit must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or suffer the slowed negative effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Сслит резко бьет хвостом и наносит <u>(от 33 до 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g} всем существам на соседних с ним клетках. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

ススリスは尻尾で激しく襲いかかり、隣接するすべてのターゲットに<u>33～42</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したターゲットは、−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格するか、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受けなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ススリスは尻尾で激しく襲いかかり、隣接する全てのターゲットに33～42の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与える。命中したターゲットは、−10ペナルティの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格するか、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、速度低下のマイナス効果を受けなければならない。

languages.text: 恶棍用尾巴猛击敌人，对周围所有邻近生物造成<u>33-42</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 恶棍用尾巴猛击敌人，对周围所有邻近生物造成33-42点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。被命中的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入减速状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: El Sslyth golpea con su cola, infligiendo <u>(de 33 a 42)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a todos los objetivos adyacentes. Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o sufrir el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El Sslyth golpea con su cola, infligiendo 33-42 de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a todos los objetivos adyacente. Los objetivos alcanzados deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −10 o sufrir el efecto negativo ralentizado durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Der Sslyth schlägt mit seinem Schwanz aus und verursacht dabei bei allen angrenzenden Zielen <u>(von 33 bis 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Getroffene{/g} Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 bestehen oder 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang den {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} erleiden.
languages.original_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Sslyth schlägt mit seinem Schwanz aus und verursacht dabei bei allen angrenzenden Zielen 33-42 {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g}. Getroffene Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von -10 bestehen oder 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang den negativen Effekt Verlangsamt erleiden.

languages.text: Le Sslyth attaque avec sa queue, infligeant <u>(de 33 à 42)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} à toutes les cibles adjacentes. Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}effet négatif{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Sslyth lashes out with its tail, dealing <u>(from 33 to 42)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all adjacent targets. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Sslyth attaque avec sa queue, infligeant 33 à 42 points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} à toutes les cibles adjacentes. Les cibles touchées doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une pénalité de -10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet négatif Ralentissement pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
